Which Function
```{r}
X<-c(2,4,7,9)
which(X==4)
```
```{r}
which.max(X)
```
```{r}
which.min(X)
```
Matrix
```{r}
matrix(1:6,nrow = 2)
```
```{r}
matrix(1:6,ncol=2)
```
```{r}
matrix(1:6,nrow=2,byrow = TRUE)
```
```{r}
rbind(1:2,1:2)
```
```{r}
cbind(1:3,1:3)
```
Lists
```{r}
List_data<-list("the",23.4,96,TRUE)
List_data
```
```{r}
z<-list("Green","Yellow",c(2,4,7),TRUE)
z
```
Naming a List
```{r}
names(z)<-c("col1","col2","col3","col4")
z
```
Dataframes
```{r}
dtr1<-c(1,2,3,4,5)
dtr1
```
```{r}
dtr2<-c("Sri","Rama","Ram","Sai","Siri")
dtr2
```
```{r}
dtr3<-data.frame(dtr1,dtr2)
dtr3
```
Naming a Dataframe
```{r}
names(dtr3)<-c("No's")
```
